«««< HEAD You are invited to apply to serve on one of The Arc’s committees. Both volunteers and staff leaders of chapters of The Arc and other stakeholders and constituents are eligible for the following:

  • Board Development Committee
  • Budget Finance & Audit Committee
  • Policy and Positions Committee
  • Legal Advocacy Subcommittee
  • Resource Development Committee
  • National Council of Self-Advocates (Council and Steering Committee Members)
  • National Siblings Council (Council and Steering Committee Members)

Read the descriptions of the roles and responsibilities of each committee, and fill out the application form. A limited number of committee assignments are available. Committee appointments are for a two year term (2017-2018). Deadline: February 7, 2017. =======

The Call for Proposals for the 2017 NCE Summer Leadership Institute is open! Submit a proposal and join chapter executives of The Arc and other professionals in the I/DD field for 2 1/2 invaluable days of dialogue, sharing and camaraderie from July 24-26 in St. Louis, MO. The submission deadline is February 17, 2017. Learn more about our submission guidelines here. We look forward to reading your proposals!

origin/gh-pages

The Call for Proposals for the 2017 NCE Summer Leadership Institute is open! Submit a proposal and join chapter executives of The Arc and other professionals in the I/DD field for 2 1/2 invaluable days of dialogue, sharing and camaraderie from July 24-26 in St. Louis, MO. The submission deadline is February 17, 2017. Learn more about our submission guidelines here. We look forward to reading your proposals!
